topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521e1476368720e90120100#post_5521e1476368720e90120100
Cause the current theory of how the universe came about was that massless space is unstable thus creating a powderkeg that gives rise to a big bang.  It's still theory, but the idea that massless space in high energy gives rise to the creation of particles has been tested and they did find that high energy space is unstable.


Think of empty space as a plane of gunpowder; if you light a match on it then the whole think is going to go.
